sentences.sContent: Roadwork is all done with spades, heavy woodcutting with hand-axes – and all work is to meet specified quotas or food was immediately reduced.
sentences.sContent_eng: Roadwork is all done with spades, heavy woodcutting with hand-axes – and all work is to meet specified quotas or food was immediately reduced.
sentences.sCn: 道路施工都是用铁锹完成的，沉重的伐木工作是用斧头——所有工作都要符合规定的进度，否则立刻就减少食物。

sentences.sContent: GIFFORD: With woodcutting machines all around, one of the local Communist Party leaders - whose family name, like almost everyone in the village, is also Sun -gives a tour of the factory.
sentences.sContent_eng: GIFFORD: With woodcutting machines all around, one of the local Communist Party leaders - whose family name, like almost everyone in the village, is also Sun -gives a tour of the factory.
sentences.sCn: 格菲德：到处都是伐木机械轰隆隆的声音，当地党委书记，也姓孙，和村里人一个姓，参观了孙先生的工厂。
